The E-Learning Copmpetence Centre of the University of Muenster orginaizes events on all sorts of subjects from the area of E-Learing.
This events should gives you an overview about how students and teachers can take advantage from using E-Learning Components in their environment. Furthermore teachers get important hints and support on how to solve usual difficulties. This service is offered only for the staff of the University of Muenster for free.
A description of the training and support possibilities can be found here
